name: Vase Your Fears: Escape the Art Gallery
name_original: Vase Your Fears: Escape the Art Gallery
description: Vase Your Fears: Escape the Art Gallery game is a silly game about a vase named Vascar, who is trying to save his fellow vase friends from a curse in an art gallery; you play as Vascar trying to save his friends. Be sure to explore the art gallery to uncover secrets and surprises in the game. We hope you get a laugh out of it and enjoy it! We appreciate any support and comments you have so we can improve our upcoming games! Thank you!
